name: BestPanel at PeopleCon
description:
You’re supposed to host the conference panel at a convention today! But oh, no! You lost your notes and now you have no idea who these panelists are. In fact, you don’t even know what the panel is even about! Oh god, you’re about to start! Better come up with something soon...

BestPanel at PeopleCon is an synchronous network game that can be played on video conference applications like Zoom or Skype.
